title: Amazing
comment: Simple, no ad, super fast, no permissions ! What else... It does exactly what it should. It would be better to have a "serious" skin but it's OK.

title: Excellent
comment: Needs no permissions. Cute graphic. Recommend it.

title: A compass not built by idiots
comment: Finally, someone understand that a compass shouldn't require full network communication or to read my contacts.

title: Ultra simple
comment: No ads and no internet connection. Does one simple job with no fuss. If only all apps were like this.

title: Easy as pie.
comment: So simple and easy to use.  Pretty!
